mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tbl ( name, login_id, password, email, role ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role} )
mapper.select: SELECT id , name , login_id , email , role FROM member_tbl WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id , name , login_id , password , email , role FROM member_tbl WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
SELECT count(*) FROM member_tbl WHERE login_id like CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND del_flag = 'N'
SELECT id , name , login_id , email , role FROM member_tbl WHERE login_id like CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND del_flag = 'N' ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
